author: lundblad
msg: On the nonxml-entries branch: Change the field and record terminators
in the new entries format from "|" and newline to newline and form feed,
(read_entry): Expect \f as start of record terminator.
(read_entries): Expect \f\n as record terminator.  Report entry
number instead of line number in error messages.
(write_str): Terminate field with \n.  Don't escape pipe ("|")
(The entries file): Change terminators to \n and \f\n.  Restructure
to describe format number separated from the rest of the file.  Don't
While here, state the format of revision numbers.
